flawed_nl_solution:
Alice was able to stack 27 + 37 = <<27+37=68>>68 plates she already stacked.
The tower crashes when there are 83 plates - 68 plates already stacked = <<83-68=15>>15 plates she was able to stack before the tower crashed.
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 68. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
